dmca.title: Notice ID: 13-73187 1st Copyright Infringement
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: dreamworks-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com
[mailto:dreamworks-no-reply@copyright-compliance.com] 
Sent: Sunday, June 12, 2005 12:45 PM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Subject: Notice ID: 13-73187 1st Copyright Infringement

-----BEGIN PGP SIGNED MESSAGE-----
Hash: SHA1

ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.

Re:  Notice of Unauthorized Use of DreamWorks Property

12 Jun 2005 17:41:44 GMT
Notice ID: 13-73187

Dear Sir or Madam:

DreamWorks LLC and its affiliated companies (collectively, "DreamWorks") are
the exclusive owners of copyrights and other proprietary rights in numerous
motion picture and television properties, including but not limited to The
Ring 2 and Madagascar.

It has come to our attention thatThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.  is
the service provider for the IP address listed below, from which
unauthorized copying and distribution (downloading, uploading, file serving,
file "swapping" or other similar activities) of DreamWorks' property(ies)
listed below is taking place.  We believe that the Internet access of the
user engaging in this infringement is provided by ThePlanet.com Internet
Services, Inc. or a downstream service provider who purchases this
connectivity from ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc..  

This unauthorized copying and distribution constitutes copyright
infringement under Section 106 of the U.S. Copyright Act.  Depending upon
the type of service ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc. is providing to
this IP address, it may have legal and/or equitable liability if it does not
expeditiously remove or disable access to the property(ies) listed below, or
if it fails to implement a policy that provides for termination of
subscribers who are repeat infringers (see, 17 U.S.C.
